column2: BRIEF-Williams files lawsuit seeking to prevent ETE from avoiding its obligations under merger agreementWilliams files suit to prevent Energy Transfer from terminating deal May 13 Williams Companies Inc said it has filed a lawsuit against Energy Transfer Equity LP to prevent it from terminating its once-coveted deal for Williams.
